ls":["bzz-raw://a8a2c3e55965b61bcd91993d8e1d5d34b8b8a63e0fdfce87a85f6af92526fd53","dweb:/ipfs/QmQj2CSCSwqDSU4KMNWxGsN2336Cy64WgpV1X1EHXNZWxM"]},"node_modules/@uniswap/v3-periphery/contracts/libraries/TransferHelper.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9af98b0908c96320ca6d08b22f0efca864742f6adbe5794cafe2d1d2e808b0cd","license":"GPL-2.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://da1d1e81e5bf534f0bf2934b3193db6cb1933f91ec006d2b88e9ad10a617a2d2","dweb:/ipfs/QmcPBk47QLMFWcX2y2S9eMFsJgoYWBd3R8ey55Bgmv6w6v"]},"src/HumanResources.sol":{"keccak256":"0x76aa2610b2455f282f776deb4dcbe8ab4afbcbcb1d3cf5f4866e97dd1f393735","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://248cff24accb74176977cec6b82dc1a733d995ae033a62d9d8bb2f234ab958d4","dweb:/ipfs/QmYFgfu9vy1UiNG8bkxhXVB621h1mmo6tPpZXEXnFEA1Vv"]},"src/interfaces/IHumanResources.sol":{"keccak256":"0xba5c6d13dcf707bd3c49f9c2d90c86cf2faacf1d24cb63b617218b9cf30a2a9d","urls":["bzz-raw://93aac1df11a50f3117b364b8bfb8ace86c8b34654f763f91671f674bb0b285e5","dweb:/ipfs/QmRbQodQGd9d54B1uiimZESihNTwHZ74ZAfEfQHJVn7BP2"]},"src/interfaces/IWETH.sol":{"keccak256":"0x05a4be726e1f099943f708541db2130fa1755a04438a6761495c6af5043fe06d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://df0861d8cdef48d11c30b3554420c21fc23765d64c10dc66a0864716cee8fc55","dweb:/ipfs/QmcgVxNJ996EDkjhhLRy2TSUd3K4CgHPCvNq1FNNF62JX2"]},"src/interfaces/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3bb1651af8d7115cc0ff96af643f7de6d29e03d765dffcf24f9dc84bdebbb6b9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b1166c160f54cf91e286dd952b68f620745903ebdae4242c989c2e97cddfe76f","dweb:/ipfs/QmXf3nE3PQ2pCbXzVJ2hUVCjGTD8sQQQMSJ2iNh5B8rL3h"]}},"version":1}

returns.employedSince: the timestamp at which the employee was registered
returns.terminatedAt: the timestamp at which the employee was terminated (or 0 if the employee is still active )
returns.weeklyUsdSalary: the weekly salary of the employee in USD , scaled with 18 decimals

params.weeklyUsdSalary: salary of the employee in USD scaled with 18 decimals

getActiveEmployeeCount().notice: Returns the number of active employees registered in the HR system

getEmployeeInfo(address).notice: Returns information about an employee If the employee does not exist , the function does not revert but all values returned must be 0

hrManager().notice: Returns the address of the HR manager

registerEmployee(address,uint256).notice: HR manager functions Only the address returned by the ‘hrManager ‘ below is able to call these functions If anyone else tries to call them , the transaction must revert with the ‘ NotAuthorized ‘ error above Registers an employee in the HR system

salaryAvailable(address).notice: Returns the salary available for withdrawal for a given employee This returns the amount in the currency the employee prefers ( USDC or ETH ) The amount must be scaled with the correct number of decimals for the currency

switchCurrency().notice: Switches the currency in which the employee receives the salary By default , the salary is paid in USDC If the employee calls this function , the salary will be paid in ETH If he calls it again , the salary will be paid in USDC again When the salary is paid in ETH , the contract will swap the amount to be paid from USDC to ETH When this function is called , the current accumulated salary should be withdrawn automatically ( emitting the ‘SalaryWithdrawn ‘ event )

terminateEmployee(address).notice: Terminates the contract of a given an employee . The salary of the employee will stop being accumulated .

withdrawSalary().notice: If anyone else tries to call them , the transaction shall revert with the ‘ NotAuthorized ‘ error above Only the ‘withdrawSalary ‘ can be called by non - active (i.e. terminated ) employees Withdraws the salary of the employee This sends either USDC or ETH to the employee , depending on the employee ’s preference The salary accumulates with time ( regardless of nights , weekends , and othernon working hours ) according to the employee weekly salary This means that after 2 days , the employee will be able to withdraw 2/7 th of is weekly salary
